Quincy.William R. Bateman House:
The William R. Bateman House is a historic house located at 148 Monroe Road in Quincy, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story, wood-framed house was built in the 1890s for William Bateman, Boston-based wool dealer. The large Queen Anne style house is located in President's Hill, at that time a fashionable neighborhood for upper-class local and Boston businessmen.
